nodes.text: Star Wars: Lightsaber Battles is a Level 2 DK Readers young readers book. It was written by Lauren Nesworthy and was published on January 4, 2018.
Find out everything you need to know about the coolest weapon in the Star Wars galaxy.

DK Reader Star Wars Lightsaber Battles takes a closer look at the mighty lightsaber. Find out about the mysterious Force that powers them, meet the Jedi and Sith who wield them and discover the tactics needed to win in a deadly lightsaber duel. Featuring amazing lightsaber clashes from across the entire movie saga as well as the popular animated TV series Star Wars Rebels. Part of DK's four-level reading scheme, the book is created in consultation with literacy experts and designed to help children learn to read - and to love reading.
